title: The Very Best Amazon Black Friday Deals 2024
description: Black Friday is here, and Amazon’s running the show—again. Whether you’re Santa-in-training, indulging in a little “me gift,” or just chasing the thrill of a killer deal, this sale has something for everyone. With savings so good you’ll wonder why you waited, it’s time to dive into the must-grabs. From slick tech to holiday essentials, … Continue reading The Very Best Amazon Black Friday Deals 2024 →
author: Billy Webb
excerpt: Black Friday is here, and Amazon’s running the show—again. Whether you're Santa-in-training, indulging in a little “me gift,” or just chasing the thrill of a
text: Featured We independently evaluate all recommended products and services. Any products or services put forward appear in no particular order. if you click on links we provide, we may receive compensation. Black Friday is here, and Amazon’s running the show—again. Whether you’re Santa-in-training, indulging in a little “me gift,” or just chasing the thrill of a killer deal, this sale has something for everyone. With savings so good you’ll wonder why you waited, it’s time to dive into the must-grabs. From slick tech to holiday essentials, here’s your guide to scoring big—because yes, those Beats headphones are calling your name. In This ArticleOur PicksFinal Thoughts asusrog / Instagram Up to 50% Off Premium Gifts: Tech Dreams Come True From Beats headphones to iPads, the tech world’s greatest hits are on sale—and we’re talking headline discounts. A pair of Beats headphones can elevate your gym grind or those endless Zoom calls, and an iPad doubles as the ultimate productivity toy. Whether you’re treating yourself or checking off a loved one’s wish list, these are the kinds of gifts that’ll make you a holiday hero. Highlights to Grab: Beats Studio Buds: Crystal-clear audio for up to 50% off. Apple iPads: Sleek, powerful, and up to 40% off. Pro Tip: Want to level up? Pair those Beats with a discounted Spotify or Apple Music subscription for the ultimate gift duo. Up to 75% Off Holiday Favorites: Deck the Halls for Less Christmas trees, lights, novelty sweaters, and festive onesies—Amazon’s got your holiday spirit covered at jaw-dropping prices. This is your moment to shine (literally, if you’re picking up those LEDs). Highlights to Grab: Pre-lit Christmas trees: Easy to assemble, with up to 75% off. Matching family onesies: Adorable and awkward—perfect for those holiday photos. Outdoor lights: Make your house the brightest on the block. Pro Tip: Go ahead and grab a backup set of string lights. There’s always that one strand that decides not to work. Up to 50% Off Cooking and Baking: Culinary Bliss Awaits From pots and pans to cocktail making machines and pizza ovens, Amazon’s Black Friday kitchen deals will have you cooking like a Michelin-star chef—or at least feeling like one. Highlights to Grab: Ninja Air Fryers: Perfectly crispy meals, now up to 40% off. Ooni Pizza Ovens: Transform your backyard into Little Italy. Bartesian Cocktail Makers: Cheers to saving up to 50% on bar-worthy drinks at home. Pro Tip: Stock up on accessories like pizza stones and fancy cocktail glasses while you’re at it. Up to 55% Off TVs: A Cinema Experience at Home Dreaming of movie nights in 4K? Now’s your chance to upgrade. Big brands like Samsung, Sony, LG, and Roku are offering its best models at deep discounts. Highlights to Grab: Samsung Smart TVs: Crystal-clear displays and seamless streaming. LG OLED TVs: The crème de la crème of visuals, at up to 55% off. Pro Tip: Pair your new TV with a discounted soundbar for surround sound that’ll make you forget the theater. Up to 40% Off Fragrances: Smell Amazing Without Breaking the Bank Treat yourself or someone you love to a signature scent this season. Amazon’s fragrance sale includes bestsellers from Ralph Lauren, Armani, Hugo Boss, and Calvin Klein. Highlights to Grab: Ralph Lauren Polo Blue: A fresh, timeless classic. Armani Code: Perfect for evening elegance. Calvin Klein Euphoria: Subtle yet unforgettable. Pro Tip: Combine a fragrance with a fancy candle (also on sale) for a luxe gift that screams thoughtfulness. Up to 30% Off Games: Fun for Everyone It doesn’t matter if you’re looking for family-friendly classics or nostalgia-inducing board games, there’s something for every player in Amazon’s Black Friday line-up. Highlights to Grab: Bop It!: Endless fun with a side of chaos. Scrabble: Because words are still cool. Battleship: Sink ships, not your budget. Pro Tip: Stock up on a few crowd-pleasers like UNO or Monopoly for those last-minute Secret Santa exchanges. Up to 20% Off Laptops: Work and Play Like a Pro Whether you’re a gamer, remote worker, or casual browser, Amazon’s laptop deals are awesome. From lightweight Chromebooks to powerhouse gaming rigs, the discounts are not to be missed. Highlights to Grab: ASUS Gaming Laptops: Top-tier performance with up to 20% off. HP Pavilion: Sleek, affordable, and perfect for everyday tasks. Pro Tip: Don’t forget to check for deals on laptop sleeves and accessories like mice and webcams. Gifts Under $10: Small Price, Big Smiles On a budget? No problem. Amazon has tons of fun, affordable finds under $10. Perfect for stocking stuffers, Secret Santa, or just spoiling the kids. Highlights to Grab: LEGO mini kits: Big fun in a small package. Nerf guns: Mini battles, major fun. Play-Doh sets: Unleash their inner artist. Pro Tip: Throw in a few under-$10 items to round out larger gifts. It’s the thought that counts, and these thoughtful touches go a long way. What Else Can You Save On? Amazon’s Black Friday extravaganza doesn’t stop there. From clothing and footwear to automotive supplies, furniture, and pet products, the deals are as endless as your imagination. Footwear: Adidas, Nike, and Puma sneakers for up to 40% off. Furniture: Everything from cozy chairs to practical desks. Pet Products: Treat your furry friend with savings on toys, beds, and more. Pro Tip: Bookmark your must-haves now, because the best deals sell out faster than you can say “Add to cart.” Final Thoughts: Black Friday Like a Pro Black Friday on Amazon is a marathon, not a sprint—but the rewards are oh-so-worth it. The key to winning? Plan ahead, shop early, and don’t be afraid to splurge on that one item you’ve been eyeing all year. After all, if Santa can spoil everyone else, you can spoil yourself, too. Billy is a content specialist and social media manager. His portfolio includes articles for publications such as British GQ, Esquire and Men’s Health. A self-confessed lover of luxury streetwear, he admits to an unhealthy obsession for baseball caps and high-end sneakers. html:
• Featured

We independently evaluate all recommended products and services. Any products or services put forward appear in no particular order. if you click on links we provide, we may receive compensation.

Black Friday is here, and Amazon’s running the show—again. Whether you’re Santa-in-training, indulging in a little “me gift,” or just chasing the thrill of a killer deal, this sale has something for everyone.

With savings so good you’ll wonder why you waited, it’s time to dive into the must-grabs. From slick tech to holiday essentials, here’s your guide to scoring big—because yes, those Beats headphones are calling your name.


In This Article

  1. Our Picks
  2. Final Thoughts

Up to 50% Off Premium Gifts: Tech Dreams Come True

From Beats headphones to iPads, the tech world’s greatest hits are on sale—and we’re talking headline discounts. A pair of Beats headphones can elevate your gym grind or those endless Zoom calls, and an iPad doubles as the ultimate productivity toy.

Whether you’re treating yourself or checking off a loved one’s wish list, these are the kinds of gifts that’ll make you a holiday hero.

Highlights to Grab:

  • Beats Studio Buds: Crystal-clear audio for up to 50% off.
  • Apple iPads: Sleek, powerful, and up to 40% off.

Pro Tip: Want to level up? Pair those Beats with a discounted Spotify or Apple Music subscription for the ultimate gift duo.

Up to 75% Off Holiday Favorites: Deck the Halls for Less

Christmas trees, lights, novelty sweaters, and festive onesies—Amazon’s got your holiday spirit covered at jaw-dropping prices. This is your moment to shine (literally, if you’re picking up those LEDs).

Highlights to Grab:

  • Pre-lit Christmas trees: Easy to assemble, with up to 75% off.
  • Matching family onesies: Adorable and awkward—perfect for those holiday photos.
  • Outdoor lights: Make your house the brightest on the block.

Pro Tip: Go ahead and grab a backup set of string lights. There’s always that one strand that decides not to work.

Up to 50% Off Cooking and Baking: Culinary Bliss Awaits

From pots and pans to cocktail making machines and pizza ovens, Amazon’s Black Friday kitchen deals will have you cooking like a Michelin-star chef—or at least feeling like one.

Highlights to Grab:

  • Ninja Air Fryers: Perfectly crispy meals, now up to 40% off.
  • Ooni Pizza Ovens: Transform your backyard into Little Italy.
  • Bartesian Cocktail Makers: Cheers to saving up to 50% on bar-worthy drinks at home.

Pro Tip: Stock up on accessories like pizza stones and fancy cocktail glasses while you’re at it.

Up to 55% Off TVs: A Cinema Experience at Home

Dreaming of movie nights in 4K? Now’s your chance to upgrade. Big brands like Samsung, Sony, LG, and Roku are offering its best models at deep discounts.

Highlights to Grab:

  • Samsung Smart TVs: Crystal-clear displays and seamless streaming.
  • LG OLED TVs: The crème de la crème of visuals, at up to 55% off.

Pro Tip: Pair your new TV with a discounted soundbar for surround sound that’ll make you forget the theater.

Up to 40% Off Fragrances: Smell Amazing Without Breaking the Bank

Treat yourself or someone you love to a signature scent this season. Amazon’s fragrance sale includes bestsellers from Ralph Lauren, Armani, Hugo Boss, and Calvin Klein.

Highlights to Grab:

  • Ralph Lauren Polo Blue: A fresh, timeless classic.
  • Armani Code: Perfect for evening elegance.
  • Calvin Klein Euphoria: Subtle yet unforgettable.

Pro Tip: Combine a fragrance with a fancy candle (also on sale) for a luxe gift that screams thoughtfulness.

Up to 30% Off Games: Fun for Everyone

It doesn’t matter if you’re looking for family-friendly classics or nostalgia-inducing board games, there’s something for every player in Amazon’s Black Friday line-up.

Highlights to Grab:

  • Bop It!: Endless fun with a side of chaos.
  • Scrabble: Because words are still cool.
  • Battleship: Sink ships, not your budget.

Pro Tip: Stock up on a few crowd-pleasers like UNO or Monopoly for those last-minute Secret Santa exchanges.

Up to 20% Off Laptops: Work and Play Like a Pro

Whether you’re a gamer, remote worker, or casual browser, Amazon’s laptop deals are awesome. From lightweight Chromebooks to powerhouse gaming rigs, the discounts are not to be missed.

Highlights to Grab:

  • ASUS Gaming Laptops: Top-tier performance with up to 20% off.
  • HP Pavilion: Sleek, affordable, and perfect for everyday tasks.

Pro Tip: Don’t forget to check for deals on laptop sleeves and accessories like mice and webcams.

Gifts Under $10: Small Price, Big Smiles

On a budget? No problem. Amazon has tons of fun, affordable finds under $10. Perfect for stocking stuffers, Secret Santa, or just spoiling the kids.

Highlights to Grab:

  • LEGO mini kits: Big fun in a small package.
  • Nerf guns: Mini battles, major fun.
  • Play-Doh sets: Unleash their inner artist.

Pro Tip: Throw in a few under-$10 items to round out larger gifts. It’s the thought that counts, and these thoughtful touches go a long way.

What Else Can You Save On?

Amazon’s Black Friday extravaganza doesn’t stop there. From clothing and footwear to automotive supplies, furniture, and pet products, the deals are as endless as your imagination.

  • Footwear: Adidas, Nike, and Puma sneakers for up to 40% off.
  • Furniture: Everything from cozy chairs to practical desks.
  • Pet Products: Treat your furry friend with savings on toys, beds, and more.

Pro Tip: Bookmark your must-haves now, because the best deals sell out faster than you can say “Add to cart.”

Final Thoughts: Black Friday Like a Pro

Black Friday on Amazon is a marathon, not a sprint—but the rewards are oh-so-worth it. The key to winning? Plan ahead, shop early, and don’t be afraid to splurge on that one item you’ve been eyeing all year. After all, if Santa can spoil everyone else, you can spoil yourself, too.

Billy is a content specialist and social media manager. His portfolio includes articles for publications such as British GQ, Esquire and Men’s Health. A self-confessed lover of luxury streetwear, he admits to an unhealthy obsession for baseball caps and high-end sneakers.

The Very Best Amazon Black Friday Deals 2024

SHARE ON

We independently evaluate all recommended products and services. Any products or services put forward appear in no particular order. if you click on links we provide, we may receive compensation.

Black Friday is here, and Amazon’s running the show—again. Whether you’re Santa-in-training, indulging in a little “me gift,” or just chasing the thrill of a killer deal, this sale has something for everyone.

With savings so good you’ll wonder why you waited, it’s time to dive into the must-grabs. From slick tech to holiday essentials, here’s your guide to scoring big—because yes, those Beats headphones are calling your name.


In This Article

  1. Our Picks
  2. Final Thoughts

Up to 50% Off Premium Gifts: Tech Dreams Come True

From Beats headphones to iPads, the tech world’s greatest hits are on sale—and we’re talking headline discounts. A pair of Beats headphones can elevate your gym grind or those endless Zoom calls, and an iPad doubles as the ultimate productivity toy.

Whether you’re treating yourself or checking off a loved one’s wish list, these are the kinds of gifts that’ll make you a holiday hero.

Highlights to Grab:

  • Beats Studio Buds: Crystal-clear audio for up to 50% off.
  • Apple iPads: Sleek, powerful, and up to 40% off.

Pro Tip: Want to level up? Pair those Beats with a discounted Spotify or Apple Music subscription for the ultimate gift duo.

Up to 75% Off Holiday Favorites: Deck the Halls for Less

Christmas trees, lights, novelty sweaters, and festive onesies—Amazon’s got your holiday spirit covered at jaw-dropping prices. This is your moment to shine (literally, if you’re picking up those LEDs).

Highlights to Grab:

  • Pre-lit Christmas trees: Easy to assemble, with up to 75% off.
  • Matching family onesies: Adorable and awkward—perfect for those holiday photos.
  • Outdoor lights: Make your house the brightest on the block.

Pro Tip: Go ahead and grab a backup set of string lights. There’s always that one strand that decides not to work.

Up to 50% Off Cooking and Baking: Culinary Bliss Awaits

From pots and pans to cocktail making machines and pizza ovens, Amazon’s Black Friday kitchen deals will have you cooking like a Michelin-star chef—or at least feeling like one.

Highlights to Grab:

  • Ninja Air Fryers: Perfectly crispy meals, now up to 40% off.
  • Ooni Pizza Ovens: Transform your backyard into Little Italy.
  • Bartesian Cocktail Makers: Cheers to saving up to 50% on bar-worthy drinks at home.

Pro Tip: Stock up on accessories like pizza stones and fancy cocktail glasses while you’re at it.

Up to 55% Off TVs: A Cinema Experience at Home

Dreaming of movie nights in 4K? Now’s your chance to upgrade. Big brands like Samsung, Sony, LG, and Roku are offering its best models at deep discounts.

Highlights to Grab:

  • Samsung Smart TVs: Crystal-clear displays and seamless streaming.
  • LG OLED TVs: The crème de la crème of visuals, at up to 55% off.

Pro Tip: Pair your new TV with a discounted soundbar for surround sound that’ll make you forget the theater.

Up to 40% Off Fragrances: Smell Amazing Without Breaking the Bank

Treat yourself or someone you love to a signature scent this season. Amazon’s fragrance sale includes bestsellers from Ralph Lauren, Armani, Hugo Boss, and Calvin Klein.

Highlights to Grab:

  • Ralph Lauren Polo Blue: A fresh, timeless classic.
  • Armani Code: Perfect for evening elegance.
  • Calvin Klein Euphoria: Subtle yet unforgettable.

Pro Tip: Combine a fragrance with a fancy candle (also on sale) for a luxe gift that screams thoughtfulness.

Up to 30% Off Games: Fun for Everyone

It doesn’t matter if you’re looking for family-friendly classics or nostalgia-inducing board games, there’s something for every player in Amazon’s Black Friday line-up.

Highlights to Grab:

  • Bop It!: Endless fun with a side of chaos.
  • Scrabble: Because words are still cool.
  • Battleship: Sink ships, not your budget.

Pro Tip: Stock up on a few crowd-pleasers like UNO or Monopoly for those last-minute Secret Santa exchanges.

Up to 20% Off Laptops: Work and Play Like a Pro

Whether you’re a gamer, remote worker, or casual browser, Amazon’s laptop deals are awesome. From lightweight Chromebooks to powerhouse gaming rigs, the discounts are not to be missed.

Highlights to Grab:

  • ASUS Gaming Laptops: Top-tier performance with up to 20% off.
  • HP Pavilion: Sleek, affordable, and perfect for everyday tasks.

Pro Tip: Don’t forget to check for deals on laptop sleeves and accessories like mice and webcams.

Gifts Under $10: Small Price, Big Smiles

On a budget? No problem. Amazon has tons of fun, affordable finds under $10. Perfect for stocking stuffers, Secret Santa, or just spoiling the kids.

Highlights to Grab:

  • LEGO mini kits: Big fun in a small package.
  • Nerf guns: Mini battles, major fun.
  • Play-Doh sets: Unleash their inner artist.

Pro Tip: Throw in a few under-$10 items to round out larger gifts. It’s the thought that counts, and these thoughtful touches go a long way.

What Else Can You Save On?

Amazon’s Black Friday extravaganza doesn’t stop there. From clothing and footwear to automotive supplies, furniture, and pet products, the deals are as endless as your imagination.

  • Footwear: Adidas, Nike, and Puma sneakers for up to 40% off.
  • Furniture: Everything from cozy chairs to practical desks.
  • Pet Products: Treat your furry friend with savings on toys, beds, and more.

Pro Tip: Bookmark your must-haves now, because the best deals sell out faster than you can say “Add to cart.”

Final Thoughts: Black Friday Like a Pro

Black Friday on Amazon is a marathon, not a sprint—but the rewards are oh-so-worth it. The key to winning? Plan ahead, shop early, and don’t be afraid to splurge on that one item you’ve been eyeing all year. After all, if Santa can spoil everyone else, you can spoil yourself, too.

Billy is a content specialist and social media manager. His portfolio includes articles for publications such as British GQ, Esquire and Men’s Health. A self-confessed lover of luxury streetwear, he admits to an unhealthy obsession for baseball caps and high-end sneakers.
